Folder.Name: 伊甸零式希望乐园：觉醒之章

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: 上面的是奇数回(D1,D2,D3,D4,其余)，下面的是偶数回(ST,MT,H1,H2,其余)

Trigger.Name: 地狱之风
Trigger.RegularExpression: gains the effect of (地狱之风|ヘルウィンド|Hell_Wind)

Trigger.Name: BUFF：延时咏唱
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<type>gains|loses) the effect of (延迟咏唱|ディレイスペル|Spell-In-Waiting) from

Trigger.Name: 延迟咏唱：暗影之眼-点你
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (延迟咏唱：暗影之眼|ディレイスペル：シャドウアイ|Spell-In-Waiting: Shadoweye).*for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds.

Trigger.Name: 延迟咏唱：暗影之眼-他人
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (延迟咏唱：暗影之眼|ディレイスペル：シャドウアイ|Spell-In-Waiting: Shadoweye).*for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds.

Trigger.Name: 延迟咏唱：地狱之风
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of gains the effect of (延迟咏唱：地狱之风|ディレイスペル：ヘルウィンド|Spell-In-Waiting: Hell Wind).*for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds.

Trigger.Name: 延迟咏唱：点你！qwq
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (延迟咏唱：|ディレイスペル：|Spell-In-Waiting: )

Trigger.Name: 延迟咏唱：核爆
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (延迟咏唱：核爆|ディレイスペル：フレア|Spell-In-Waiting: Flare).*for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds.

Trigger.Name: 延迟咏唱：黑暗爆炎
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (延迟咏唱：黑暗爆炎|ディレイスペル：ダークファイガ|Spell-In-Waiting: Dark Fire III).*for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds.

Trigger.Name: 延迟咏唱：黑暗神圣
Trigger.RegularExpression: gains the effect of (延迟咏唱：黑暗神圣|ディレイスペル：ダークホーリー|Spell-In-Waiting: Unholy Darkness).*for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds.

Trigger.Name: 空无的恶意
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:3E6B:(?<name>厄瑞玻斯的巨腕|エレボスの巨腕|The Hand of Erebos) starts

Trigger.Name: 坦克：大圈T
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (暴风之兆|暴風の兆し|Scouring Waters)

Trigger.Name: 坦克：瀑布T
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (断绝之兆|断絶の兆し|Sundering Waters)

Trigger.Name: 输出：瀑布D
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (断绝之兆|断絶の兆し|Sundering Waters)

Trigger.Name: 治疗：分摊H
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (溺没之兆|溺没の兆し|Smothering Waters)

Trigger.Name: 治疗：三角H
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (扩散之兆|拡散の兆し|Sweeping Waters)

Trigger.Name: 输出：分摊D
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (溺没之兆|溺没の兆し|Smothering Waters)

Trigger.Name: 输出：菊花D
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (扩散之兆|拡散の兆し|Sweeping Waters)

Trigger.Name: 输出：三角D
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (扩散之兆|拡散の兆し|Sweeping Waters)

Trigger.Name: 非瀑布
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (断绝之兆|断絶の兆し|Sundering Waters)

Trigger.Name: 瀑布
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+) gains the effect of (断绝之兆|断絶の兆し|Sundering Waters)

Trigger.Name: Reset
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:0039:(戦闘開始！|Engage!|战斗开始！)

Trigger.Name: 断罪之桩（连线）
Trigger.RegularExpression: 23:.{8}:(断罪之桩|断罪の杭|nails? of condemnation):(?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+):.*:0000:0011:

Trigger.Name: 设置职位（/s说话或/p小队）
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:000[ae]:(?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+):(?<role>[sSmMhHdD][tT1-4])

Trigger.Name: 目标的位置
Trigger.RegularExpression: Souma_Distance:(?<name>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+):(?<text>[\w\u4e00-\u9fa5 ]+):(?<time>[\d\.]+)

Trigger.Name: 目标的位置－设置坐标偏移
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:0039:(戦闘開始！|Engage!|战斗开始！)
